summary: Makes the elk+deer models actually change once you harvest their antlers!
descriptionHtml:
Truly Harvest Antlers v1.0
by Blitz54

----------------
Description
----------------

This mod simply makes the elk and deer models change once the player takes the antlers from the carcass. I used the briar heart script, and made a duplicate because I needed to apply it twice to the large antlers. The models are based of the vanilla models, so if you have any replacer, the non-antler model may look noticeably different.

A quick vid is in the video section.

-----------------
Known Bugs
-----------------

-If you place the antlers back into the dead bodies, the model will revert back to normal. Consider this though, maybe the Dovahkiin glued them back on? I mean, it IS more logical that the antlers would be visible and outside of the body, and not inside this invisible container, right?
-The model flashes when changing, and for a half a second you see nothing. Can\'t do anything about that.
-Spelt Truly wrong on the main picture...

------------------
Compatibility
------------------

May have issues with any mods that change the name of elk/deer races and parts.
Possible issue if you have a mod that someone altered the briarheart scripts.

-------------------------------------
Check out my other mods!
-------------------------------------
